sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Copy value of email id from 'sn_wsd_case.wsd_inbound_email' to 'sn_wsd_core.wsd_inbound_email' sys property.
Set 'sys_class_name' field for reservation records where it is not set.</description>
        <name>Set wsd_inbound_email & sys_class_name</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Copy value of email id from 'sn_wsd_case.wsd_inbound_email' to 'sn_wsd_core.wsd_inbound_email' sys property
copyInboundEmailSysProperty();

// Set 'sys_class_name' field for reservation records where it is not set
setSysClassName();

function copyInboundEmailSysProperty() {
    WPLogger.info('copyInboundEmailSysProperty', 'Copy value of email id from sn_wsd_case.wsd_inbound_email to sn_wsd_core.wsd_inbound_email sys property - Started');
    if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_wsd_case')) {
        var caseEmailId = gs.getProperty('sn_wsd_case.wsd_inbound_email');
        if (!gs.nil(caseEmailId)) {
            var sysPropGr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
            sysPropGr.addQuery('name', 'sn_wsd_core.wsd_inbound_email');
            sysPropGr.setLimit(1);
            sysPropGr.query();

            if (sysPropGr.next() && sysPropGr.value != caseEmailId) {
                sysPropGr.setValue('value', caseEmailId);
                sysPropGr.update();
            }
        }
    }
    WPLogger.info('copyInboundEmailSysProperty', 'Copy value of email id from sn_wsd_case.wsd_inbound_email to sn_wsd_core.wsd_inbound_email sys property - Completed');
}

function setSysClassName() {
    WPLogger.info('setSysClassName', 'Set sys_class_name field for reservation records where it is not set - Started');

    if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_wsd_rsv')) {
        var roomReservationGr = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_rsv_reservation');
        roomReservationGr.addNullQuery('sys_class_name');
        roomReservationGr.setWorkflow(false);

        roomReservationGr.setValue('sys_class_name', 'sn_wsd_rsv_reservation');
        roomReservationGr.updateMultiple();
    }

    var reservationGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.RESERVATION);
    reservationGr.addNullQuery('sys_class_name');
    reservationGr.setWorkflow(false);

    reservationGr.setValue('sys_class_name', WPConstants.TABLES.RESERVATION);
    reservationGr.updateMultiple();

    WPLogger.info('setSysClassName', 'Set sys_class_name field for reservation records where it is not set - Completed');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-14 15:24:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d6ffc2b0079310106275e7a30ad300c3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set wsd_inbound_email & sys_class_name</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d6ffc2b0079310106275e7a30ad300c3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-15 17:26:34</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
